archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
LIMS (Laboratory Information Management System)
Purpose: Automates and tracks lab operations from sample receipt through result reporting.
Core Modules & Functions:
• Sample Lifecycle Management: Barcoding, accessioning, chain of custody, storage location tracking • Test Ordering & Results: Electronic order entry, result validation, delta checks, result auto-verification • Quality Control & Compliance: QC schedules, calibration logs, audit trails, CAP/COLA compliance reporting • Instrument Integration: Bidirectional interfaces with analyzers, middleware, and robotics
Architecture & Integration:
• Middleware architecture sits between instruments and the EHR, delivering results over HL7 ORU messages • Optional extension into biobanking and research data marts
Example Software Highlights:
• LabWare LIMS: Highly configurable workflows, rules-based routing, enterprise reporting engine • Thermo Fisher SampleManager: Unified informatics platform, built-in LIMS, ELN (Electronic Lab Notebook), LES
